price: 57. Hij zei: “Ben jij gekomen om ons met je toverkunsten uit ons land te verjagen, O, Moesa?”
arabic: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla aji'tanā litukh'rijanā min arḍinā bisiḥ'rika yāmūsā
